body.name: Ecover Fabric Softener - Morning Fresh - 32 Fl Oz (Pack of 2)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery February 20 - 21. Order within 19 hrs 13 mins.
FREE delivery February 20 - 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
body.description: Ecover Fabric Softener, Morning FreshEcover Fabric Softener is compatible with High Efficiency machines (HE) and helps to soften and freshen your laundry. It also makes ironing easier, reduces static cling and is gentle to your skin while leaving behind a fresh plant based fragrance.Environmental benefits:plant based ingredientsquick and complete biodegradabilityminimum impact on aquatic lifeno animal testingsafe for septic tanksBottle and labels are made of polyethylenecap of polypropylenePolyethylene and polypropylene are 100% recyclable and can be recycled together perfectly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very good and not full of poison. The smell is acceptable. I like the sunny day better but this is pretty nice. I’m very happy with it since I couldn’t get the sunny day one but it’s organic and it doesn’t have poisons so it’s not real strong smelling like you’re wearing chemicals I’m happy with it I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The smell and softness of this product are great. It is nice to know im not adding any extra forever chemicals to my body through laundry products

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m not a fan of the smell but it’s just my preference, my clothes are soft and I would recommend this fabric softener.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally a fabric softener that is not over powering!!
reviews.reviewText: Finally a fabric softener that is not over powering!! Most make you smell like you just came out of a perfume factory that you have been in for days. If you are like me, and you do not like the strong or even moderate perfume smell of fabric softeners this one is for you. This fabric softener has a very mild to faint clean clothes smell, just the way I like it. If you want a mild, moderate or strong smelling fabric softener this is not the one for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this fabric softener
reviews.reviewText: Love the smell…not too much perfume (which I really appreciate).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Light Scent/Clean Product
reviews.reviewText: I like the light scent of this fabric softener and have been using it for years. It seems like a cleaner laundry product than the more commercial fabric softeners. It would be nice to have the packaging be biodegradable or something else more environmentally friendly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent consistency, fresh clean scent, good for the environment
reviews.reviewText: We’ve used this product for over 4 years. Excellent consistency, fresh clean scent, good for the environment! Highly recommend. I noticed some reviews were giving this 1 star for an overly thick consistency. That happened to us for one shipment, but they replaced the product. It’s been back to normal for over 6 months now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good fabric softener for those with health issues
reviews.reviewText: I really like this fabric softener. I have asthma and a lot of allergies and spent a lot of time researching various household products that I could use that wouldn't aggravate these health conditions. Let me tell you, its no easy feat finding cleaning products that I can use. Even products that will use words like " organic" or "natural" arent always as wholesome as they might seem. Even in this brand, the other scents have additional ingredients that set off my asthma. But luckily this "morning fresh" scent is very user friendly when it comes to this user and her obnoxious allergies!As far as its functionality as a fabric softener, it does make my clothes soft and fluffy. I usually use one capful of the softener per load, or two if I want what ever I am washing to be super soft (I have a HE washer, so its possible you'd need a different amount in a standard washing machine).Also, I happen to like the scent itself. I find it very pleasant, so bonus!! :-PVery happy with my purchase
